item.title: Custom achievement system | need help
item.dc:creator: @mousamsh mousamsh
item.description:
@mousamsh wrote:

What my goal is to do is once you hit 50 NPCs Kills, You are automatically awarded 1M Coins into your bank or inv
My code looks like this, There could be more to the code I’m missing but I’m new to JAVA (3 Months in)

if (npcKills == 50) {
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100000);
c.sM(“You have been awarded 1M Coins”);
c.SaveGame();
}
break;

I think this code would work but I dont know which class to put it in and where in the class to put it
If anyone can help me, Ill be glad to show you my custom system and explain it further!

Skype = tonebawsjinx

Read full topic
